title: Gairdoch F.C.
text: Gairdoch Football Club was a <a href="Scotland">Scottish</a> <a href="association%20football">association football</a> club based in the village of <a href="Carronshore">Carronshore</a>, <a href="Stirlingshire">Stirlingshire</a>. The club was founded in 1886 and disbanded in 1896. The club competed in the <a href="Scottish%20Cup">Scottish Cup</a> for three seasons between 1888 and 1890 as well as the regional <a href="Stirlingshire%20Cup">Stirlingshire Cup</a> competition. The club's home colours were black and white striped shirts with white shorts until 1889 when they changed to blue shirts with dark shorts.
